string.name: About_data
string.br: The DCC CSE digital week is an annual digital campaign run at the Department of computer Science and Engineering, DHAKA CITY COLLEGE.\n
Each year we celebrate some events focused on interactive tech learning opportunitiees Students,Teachers,Volunteers,Organizers all enjoy the events thoughout the department.\n
An initiative of DCC UNITED, the events highlight innovation,Programming designing ideas and competutions. You can get involved too!!
